title: Melbourne Day 1 - Drupal Tour 2016
body:
My first day in Australia was quite relaxed and comfy, Yersika leads me in Melbourne and shows me some of her favorite spots in the city.

So far the city looked clean, green and organized, well that is not really surprising because Melbourne year after year is ranked as one of the best cities to live in the world, but I could corroborate by myself.

At the end of the day, I meet up with my former classmate Nestor Valverde who is living recently in Melbourne, was an excellent meetup to talk about our lives after 15 years donâ€™t see each other and 10k+ kilometers away from our alma matter.
